reviewtext: I know it seems great to have today's portable earbuds. But you can't beat the sound quality for the dollar in Sony headphones. I have the "old version" of these, loved them for the past 15 years. My hubby borrowed them, and wouldn't give them back! So I ordered these for him, hoping he'd switch (he did - YAY!).Before you order any of the "celebrity-endorsed" or other logo-related headphones, check the Hz. For the dollar, you won't beat these sweet phones!
